'''Radiant Spincrystal 109''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Clockwork Waltz]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located outside of the [[Fortress of Meropide]].
